Tool Coding documentation¶

Here we will have the details about the implemenation

Extract Text Util¶

Module Name : extract__text_util

Module to extract text from PDF using PyPDF2 library and pdftohtml, It has two method implementation :func: extract_text_pdf_py2pdf

class extract_text_util.pdftoText¶

Class to generate plain text from pdf files Used two methods to do it - (1). PyPDF2 library (2). pdftohtml from Calibre tool

__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

static _get_xml_from_pdf_pdftohtml(file_path)¶

Method to generate xml file from pdf file using pdftohtml

Parameters

file_path – generated xml file path

Returns

xml file path

static _parse_xml(file)¶

Method to parse xml file and return plain text format

Parameters

file – xml file path

Returns

plain text, page count

extract_text_pdf_pdftohtml(pdf_filepath)¶

Method to consolidate _get_xml_from_pdf_pdftohtml and _parse_xml methods

Parameters

pdf_filepath – pdf file path

Returns

plain text of pdf, page count and pdf file name

static extract_text_pdf_py2pdf(pdf_filepath)¶

Method to extract text from the input pdf file

Returns

text data, number of pages in file

Return type

string

Main Module or function¶

Module to compare plain text of pdf files and write information to excel output file.

class pdf_text_check.PdfCompare(file_path)¶

Class to compare plain text of new pdf and old pdf files and generate excel file to write extracted information

__init__(file_path)¶

Init method of Pdfcompare class

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

static _write_df_to_excel(df)¶

Method to write data frame into excel file

Parameters

df – data frame

Returns

data frame

static beatify_excel(excel_file)¶

Method to write data to excel file :param excel_file: :return: non

compare_pdf(file1, file2, excel_out_file=None)¶

Method to compare two pdf file and shows a detailed difference in an output excel file

Parameters

  • excel_out_file – excel file data

  • file1 – new pdf file

  • file2 – old pdf file

Returns

page count of file, data deleted from old file, data added into new file

excel_load(file_name, column_to_load)¶

Method to read excel data using pandas

Parameters

column_to_load – `` list of column to read``

Returns

dataframe

get_file_difference(data_pdf1, data_pdf2)¶

Method to calculate data added or removed in pdf1 compared to pdf2

Parameters

  • data_pdf1 – data pdf1

  • data_pdf2 – data pdf2

Returns

data added in new file, data removed from old file

static get_pdf_info(pdf_filepath)¶

Method to get pdf information creation date, modification date and size of pdf file

Parameters

pdf_filepath – path of the pdf file

Returns

modificationTime, creation_time, file_size_in_kb
